description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=2/3. Where does one man end and another begin? Become any character you meet in this unique story-driven game! Unforgettable characters, engrossing story, and 20 original songs make Light's End a must-play experience. Visit www.lightsendgame.com!
